title: An ADC should always love their support
body:
http://oldlim.deviantart.com/art/Our-Sup-441588953

[Artist](http://oldlim.deviantart.com/)

However they may love Leona a bit TOO much.

replies.body: Is that Tristana holding boobs of Leona?
She is holding up the Suns
The dolla bills though.

I didn't notive Sivir trying to bribe Leona until you said that!

Thanks!

Do you suck as support?
Play leona
I suck at support but I do love playing Leona from time to time^^
This right here is why you are one of my favorite boards memebers.
Because I suck at supporting?

No, because you love playing Leona from time to time.

She's my second favorite champion, and my go-to gal for support.

^^
Well, thing is, Leona might just be the manliest support and how I play her is practically balls to the walls all or nothing xD
I mean, leo is pretty balls to the wall, But when it comes to manly I can think of other supports.
Maybe because he plays a lot of Leona and you like her too...along with your Mordekaiser spam thing.

The first two times I ever played Leona was mid and top.

I won both lanes
Inb4 Face The Sun???????????????? Question Mark?
Supports let me get the items I need to crit the tota off the enemy team & for that I am eternally grateful <3

I upvoted as soon as the image loaded up and I saw that Leona was the support.

Then I scrolled down and saw Tristana touching Leona's breastplate with her chest resting on Tristana's head. . . .

I laughed so upvote well spent!

(' ')b
I'm tempted to show up as support Teemo just in hopes of being paired up with Tristana.
After that game she will probably start dating Rumble

(Later, pulls off an S rank and the adc is fed.)

{{champion:17}}: Shall we?

{{champion:18}}: Let's go!

(And they lived happily ever after. XD )
Love thy support as yourself.
~~Trist knows where it's at.~~
